articles.title: Singapore university creates first laser-powered device able to trap and move a single virus - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): In a first of its kind, a laser-powered device that can trap and move a single virus around using light has been created in Singapore.
articles.content:
